content.content: For this manual therapy business in Rossland, BC, our agency delivered a sleek, high-performance landing page that integrates seamlessly with the client's existing booking system, JaneApp. We used vanilla CSS and JavaScript to create smooth animations and interactivity, ensuring a custom feel while keeping the site lightweight and fast. The site features a Getform.io-powered contact form and an embedded Google Maps API to make it easy for potential clients to find the business. Google Analytics integration enables data-driven insights to optimize performance over time.

This project encompassed end-to-end services, including photography and image editing, web development, and deployment. We collaborated with designer Sean Makura to bring this vision to life, blending function with aesthetic to create a streamlined, user-friendly experience for both the business and its clients.
